entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
